submitMessage: The information contained in this form will be made available on-line to the Permanent Representation, or Mission of your country in Brussels. All applications received directly from administrations of beneficiaries will be forwarded to the EU Delegation / Office concerned for a preliminary evaluation. This application form has a validity period of two years from the date that it was submitted; TAIEX reserves the right to cancel any event that has not been implemented within the two year period.

questionList.label: Type
questionList.hint: Please select one project type (workshop, expert mission or study visit) or in case of multiple events please select series of events

questionList.label: Objective of the request
questionList.hint: Please include a list of the workshops, expert missions and study visits that you would like to request within the above-mentioned project and the relevant Chapter/Sub-chapter of EU Legislation cited later. (Participant information will be required later in relation to study visits)

questionList.label: Why specifically is a study visit being requested instead of an expert mission or a workshop?
What will the Member State Expert(s) focus on during the visit?
What will the Member State Expert(s) focus on during the visit?
Target audience
questionList.hint: Specify if officials from Ministries, institutions, regulatory authorities, professional associations or other
Please give reference to EU regulations, directives etc.

questionList.label: Proposed indicative date of the exchange/event
Main topics/content
questionList.hint: Please list in details the issues you would like to discuss with the Member States expert(s), such as legislation, infrastructure, strategies, training and any other elements of relevance. Please include the aim as well as the expected impact/outcome of the requested assistance

questionList.label: Current situation/justification
questionList.hint: Please describe briefly the current situation related to the sector of legislation concerned and provide all information that can contribute to the evaluation of your application

questionList.label: Previous TAIEX and Twinning assistance?
questionList.hint: If yes, please indicate details of the previous events and the outcome of the assistance provided

questionList.label: Is there any planned or currently running project financed by EU funds and/or other international programmes dealing with the issues covered by the request? Has any such project been implemented in the last two years?
questionList.hint: If yes, please provide details thereof

questionList.label: Additional information
questionList.hint: Please provide the following information for each of the events in the series (max 5)

questionList.label: Proposed indicative date of the exchange/event
Main topics/content
questionList.hint: Please list in details the issues you would like to discuss with the Member States expert(s), such as legislation, infrastructure, strategies, training and any other elements of relevance. Please include the aim as well as the expected impact/outcome of the requested assistance

questionList.label: Member State administration(s) from which you wish to receive the expertise
questionList.hint: Preferred Member State (The choice cannot be always guaranteed), Optional

questionList.label: Do you know the Member State expert from whom you wish to receive expertise (Optional)?
Beneficiary contact person for administrative questions and practical matters related to this event
Contact person for the evaluation of the impact of TAIEX assistance
Add participants
questionList.hint: The data you provided will be solely used for the organisation of TAIEX events unless otherwise stated. You are entitled to have your data deleted or removed from our database at any time.
